channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Unknown parked car, 1st October
item.description:
A black vauxhall has been parked outside for 10 weeks with no one returning to it. It is causing some parking issues for local residents.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Churchill Drive, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Signs & Street Furniture problem, 1st October
item.description:
GIVE AND TAKE 28 DAY WITH TEMPORARY FOOTWAY CLOSURE PLEASE RESET X1 LEANING CONCRETE BOLLARD 1000X250MM stats required (Damaged Bollard)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drain, 1st October
item.description:
Blocked drain near top of Springbank Road Water running down the road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 50f, Springbank Road, Springbank, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Numerous pot holes and surface cracks along bike wheel line, 1st October
item.description:
The carriageway heading west from the racecourse roundabout to the mini roundabout at Tommy Taylors Lane. Numerous potholes, cracking and sunken chambers along this length, all are within the wheel line for cyclists using this route, so it presents a serious danger to cyclists.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 18, Swindon Lane, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavement coming away, 1st October
item.description:
Near corner with Mayfield left hand side also other end near roundabout
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hillview Drive, Hucclecote, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 1st October
item.description:
NWD WITH GIVE AND TAKE PLEASE REMOVE X1 BROKEN YOUNG TREE TO MAKE SAFE 3 METERS X1000 METER (Damaged Tree)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drainage ditch/channel adjacent/ parallel to Pittville School playing field is blocked by caved in large stone blocks where the banks have collapsed. Just before it enters Wymans Brook. Potential flooding problem on Albert Road. Please note extensive drainage works on Pittville School playing field will exacerbate future drainage issues., 1st October
item.description:
Opposite (east) side of road to 82 Albert Road. Just north of Wymans Brook road bridge east side. Just observed but must have occurred before today. Very important this drainage ditch is kept clear as sports field next to it will need somewhere for water run off when new Sports field is re-laid with pitches and running track.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Albert Road, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Various potholes the length of this road getting bigger, 1st October
item.description:
Trevour Road from the junction off Simmons Road all the way up to the right hand bend at the top.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Trevor Road, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 1st October
item.description:
Please cut back and tidy up approx. 500m of overgrown hedges and weeds on F/W - 28 days - F/W closure - see photos (Overgrown Hedge)

item.title: TMC - Defects - Kerbs and Channels problem, 1st October
item.description:
